FuncDef: The display dcn default-port command displays information about interfaces on which the DCN feature is enabled by default.
Examples: There are total 3 physical port(s) support DCN in chassis.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Whether the DCN feature is enabled by default on an interface depends on the type of the subcard on which the interface resides and the number of interfaces on the subcard. To view the interfaces on which the DCN feature is enabled by default, run the display dcn default-port command.
Prerequisites
The DCN feature has been enabled globally using the dcn command in the system view.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
